summary: "Audition" is a 1999 Japanese horror movie directed by Takashi Miike. A middle-aged man, wanting a new girlfriend, stages a fake audition with his friend's help. He chooses a woman, but her dark past causes problems in their relationship. Based on a novel, the film was shot in Tokyo and received awards at international film festivals. It was praised by Western critics for its shocking final scene and has been listed among the best horror films.
title: Audition (1999 film)
